summary: Beloved for its combination of thrilling combat choreography and hilarious physical comedy, the film tells the story of a humble cashier who discovers a plot to kill his small town mayor.
cast: Ka-Yan Leung|Casanova Wong|Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Chia-Yung Liu|Billy Chan|Lung Chan|Fat Chung|Hark-On Fung|Ching-Ying Lam|Hoi Sang Lee|Dean Shek|Eric Tsang|Cheng-Wu Yang|Biao Yuen
title: Zan xian sheng yu zhao qian Hua
